summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: V-5 SERIES. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 13E047000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED FOUR MONTHS AGO. THE HELMET WAS SENT TO THE MANUFACTURER PER THEIR REQUEST. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 1-866-371-0281 AND THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK. THE CONTACT HAD NOT RECEIVED A RESPONSE. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
